text.description: The color can be specified either with their name (https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value. The default value is `rgb(0, 0, 0)`.
text.title: Text

name.description: The color can be specified either with their name (https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value. The default value is `rgb(0, 79, 144)`.
name.title: Name

connections.description: The color can be specified either with their name (https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value. The default value is `rgb(0, 79, 144)`.
connections.title: Connections

section_titles.description: The color can be specified either with their name (https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value. The default value is `rgb(0, 79, 144)`.
section_titles.title: Section Titles

links.description: The color can be specified either with their name (https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value. The default value is `rgb(0, 79, 144)`.
links.title: Links

last_updated_date_and_page_numbering.description: The color can be specified either with their name (https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value. The default value is `rgb(128, 128, 128)`.
last_updated_date_and_page_numbering.title: Last Updated Date And Page Numbering

photo.description: Path to the photo of the person, relative to the input file.
photo.title: Photo

phone.description: Country code should be included. For example, +1 for the United States.
phone.title: Phone

date.description: Can be written in the formats YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY, or as an arbitrary string such as 'Fall 2023.'

start_date.description: Can be written in the formats YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY.

end_date.description: Can be written in the formats YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY. If the event is ongoing, write "present" or provide only the `start_date`.
end_date.title: End Date

main_column_first_row_template.description: The content of the template. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries in uppercase. For example, **TITLE**. The default value is `**INSTITUTION**, AREA`.
main_column_first_row_template.title: Main Column First Row Template

degree_column_template.description: If given, a degree column will be added to the education entry. If "null", no degree column will be shown. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries (in uppercase). The default value is `**DEGREE**`.
degree_column_template.title: Degree Column Template

degree_column_width.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `1cm`.

main_column_second_row_template.description:
The content of the template. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries in uppercase. For example, **TITLE**. The default value is `SUMMARY
HIGHLIGHTS`.
main_column_second_row_template.title: Main Column Second Row Template

date_and_location_column_template.description:
The content of the template. The available placeholders are all the keys used in the entries in uppercase. For example, **TITLE**. The default value is `LOCATION
DATE`.
date_and_location_column_template.title: Date And Location Column Template

language.description: The language of the locale. The default value is 'english'.
language.title: Language

phone_number_format.description: If 'national', phone numbers are formatted without the country code. If 'international', phone numbers are formatted with the country code. The default value is 'national'.
phone_number_format.title: Phone Number Format

page_numbering_template.description:
The template of the page numbering at the bottom of the page.

The following placeholders can be used:
- NAME: The name of the person
- PAGE_NUMBER: The current page number
- TOTAL_PAGES: The total number of pages
- TODAY: Today's date with `locale.date_template`
page_numbering_template.title: Page Numbering Template

last_updated_date_template.description:
The template of the last updated date at the top right corner of the page.

The following placeholders can be used:
- NAME: The name of the person
- TODAY: Today's date with `locale.date_template`
last_updated_date_template.title: Last Updated Date Template

date_template.description:
The template of the date.

The following placeholders can be used:
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month (e.g., January)
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month (e.g., Jan)
- MONTH: Month as a number (e.g., 1)
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits (e.g., 01)
- YEAR: Year as a number (e.g., 2024)
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits (e.g., 24)
date_template.title: Date Template

month.title: Month

months.description: Translation of the word "months" in the locale.

year.description: Translation of the word "year" in the locale.
year.title: Year

years.description: Translation of the word "years" in the locale.
years.title: Years

present.description: Translation of the word "present" in the locale.
present.title: Present

to.description: The word or character used to indicate a range in the locale (e.g., "2020 - 2021").

abbreviations_for_months.description: Abbreviations of the months in the locale.
abbreviations_for_months.title: Abbreviations For Months

full_names_of_months.description: Full names of the months in the locale.

date_and_location_width.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `4.15cm`.

left_and_right_margin.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.2cm`.

horizontal_space_between_columns.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.1cm`.

vertical_space_between_entries.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `1.2em`.

allow_page_break_in_sections.description: Whether to allow page breaks in sections. The default value is `true`.
allow_page_break_in_sections.title: Allow Page Break In Sections

allow_page_break_in_entries.description: Whether to allow page breaks in entries. The default value is `true`.
allow_page_break_in_entries.title: Allow Page Break In Entries

short_second_row.description: If this option is `True`, second row will be shortened to leave the bottom of the date empty. The default value is `False`.
short_second_row.title: Short Second Row

show_time_spans_in.description: The list of section titles where the time spans will be shown in the entries. The default value is `[]`.
show_time_spans_in.title: Show Time Spans In

date.description: Can be written in the formats YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY, or as an arbitrary string such as 'Fall 2023.'

start_date.description: Can be written in the formats YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY.

end_date.description: Can be written in the formats YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY. If the event is ongoing, write "present" or provide only the `start_date`.
end_date.title: End Date

name_bold.description: Whether to make the name bold. The default value is `true`.
name_bold.title: Name Bold

small_caps_for_name.description: Whether to use small caps for the name. The default value is `false`.
small_caps_for_name.title: Small Caps For Name

photo_width.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `3.5cm`.

vertical_space_between_name_and_connecti.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.7cm`.

vertical_space_between_connections_and_f.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.7cm`.

horizontal_space_between_connections.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.5cm`.

separator_between_connections.description: The separator between the connections. The default value is `''`.
separator_between_connections.title: Separator Between Connections

use_icons_for_connections.description: Whether to use icons for the connections. The default value is `True`.
use_icons_for_connections.title: Use Icons For Connections

use_urls_as_placeholders_for_connections.description: Whether to use URLs as placeholders for the connections. The default value is `False`.
use_urls_as_placeholders_for_connections.title: Use Urls As Placeholders For Connections

make_connections_links.description: Whether to make the connections links. The default value is `True`.
make_connections_links.title: Make Connections Links

horizontal_space_between_bullet_and_high.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.5em`.

summary_left_margin.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0cm`.

date.description: The date that will be used everywhere (e.g., in the output file names, last updated date, computation of time spans for the events that are currently happening, etc.). The default value is the today's date.
date.title: Date

render_command.description: RenderCV's `render` command settings. They are the same as the command line arguments. CLI arguments have higher priority than the settings in the input file.
render_command.title: Render Command Settings

bold_keywords.description: The keywords that will be bold in the output. The default value is an empty list.
bold_keywords.title: Bold Keywords

sort_entries.description: How the entries should be sorted based on their dates. The available options are 'reverse-chronological', 'chronological', or `null`. The default value is `null`.
sort_entries.title: Sort Entries

design.description: The file path to the YAML file that contains the `design` field.
design.title: Design

locale.description: The file path to the YAML file that contains the `locale` field.
locale.title: Locale

output_folder_path.description:
The path to the folder where the output files will be saved. The following placeholders can be used:

- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month (e.g., January)
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month (e.g., Jan)
- MONTH: Month as a number (e.g., 1)
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits (e.g., 01)
- YEAR: Year as a number (e.g., 2024)
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits (e.g., 24)
- NAME: The name of the CV owner (e.g., John Doe)
- NAME_IN_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in snake case (e.g., John_Doe)
- NAME_IN_LOWER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower snake case (e.g., john_doe)
- NAME_IN_UPPER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper snake case (e.g., JOHN_DOE)
- NAME_IN_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in kebab case (e.g., John-Doe)
- NAME_IN_LOWER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower kebab case (e.g., john-doe)
- NAME_IN_UPPER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper kebab case (e.g., JOHN-DOE)
output_folder_path.title: Output Folder Path

pdf_path.description:
The path to copy the PDF file to. If it is not provided, the PDF file will not be copied. The following placeholders can be used:

- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month (e.g., January)
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month (e.g., Jan)
- MONTH: Month as a number (e.g., 1)
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits (e.g., 01)
- YEAR: Year as a number (e.g., 2024)
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits (e.g., 24)
- NAME: The name of the CV owner (e.g., John Doe)
- NAME_IN_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in snake case (e.g., John_Doe)
- NAME_IN_LOWER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower snake case (e.g., john_doe)
- NAME_IN_UPPER_SNAKE_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper snake case (e.g., JOHN_DOE)
- NAME_IN_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in kebab case (e.g., John-Doe)
- NAME_IN_LOWER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in lower kebab case (e.g., john-doe)
- NAME_IN_UPPER_KEBAB_CASE: The name of the CV owner in upper kebab case (e.g., JOHN-DOE)
pdf_path.title: Pdf Path

dont_generate_html.description: A boolean value to determine whether the HTML file will be generated. The default value is `False`.
dont_generate_html.title: Don't Generate HTML

dont_generate_markdown.description: A boolean value to determine whether the Markdown file will be generated. The default value is `False`.
dont_generate_markdown.title: Don't Generate Markdown

dont_generate_pdf.description: A boolean value to determine whether the PDF file will be generated. The default value is `False`.
dont_generate_pdf.title: Don't Generate PDF

dont_generate_png.description: A boolean value to determine whether the PNG file will be generated. The default value is `False`.
dont_generate_png.title: Don't Generate PNG

watch.description: A boolean value to determine whether to re-run RenderCV when the inputfile is updated. The default value is `False`.
watch.title: Re-run RenderCV When the Input File is Updated

bold.description: Whether to make the section titles bold. The default value is `true`.
bold.title: Bold

small_caps.description: Whether to use small caps for the section titles. The default value is `false`.
small_caps.title: Small Caps

line_thickness.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.5pt`.

vertical_space_above.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.5cm`.

vertical_space_below.description: It can be specified with units (cm, in, pt, mm, ex, em). For example, `0.1cm`. The default value is `0.3cm`.

language.description: The language of the locale. The default value is 'english'.
language.title: Language

phone_number_format.description: If 'national', phone numbers are formatted without the country code. If 'international', phone numbers are formatted with the country code. The default value is 'national'.
phone_number_format.title: Phone Number Format

page_numbering_template.description:
The template of the page numbering at the bottom of the page.

The following placeholders can be used:
- NAME: The name of the person
- PAGE_NUMBER: The current page number
- TOTAL_PAGES: The total number of pages
- TODAY: Today's date with `locale.date_template`
page_numbering_template.title: Page Numbering Template

last_updated_date_template.description:
The template of the last updated date at the top right corner of the page.

The following placeholders can be used:
- NAME: The name of the person
- TODAY: Today's date with `locale.date_template`
last_updated_date_template.title: Last Updated Date Template

date_template.description:
The template of the date.

The following placeholders can be used:
- FULL_MONTH_NAME: Full name of the month (e.g., January)
- MONTH_ABBREVIATION: Abbreviation of the month (e.g., Jan)
- MONTH: Month as a number (e.g., 1)
- MONTH_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Month as a number in two digits (e.g., 01)
- YEAR: Year as a number (e.g., 2024)
- YEAR_IN_TWO_DIGITS: Year as a number in two digits (e.g., 24)
date_template.title: Date Template

month.description: Translation of the word "month" in the locale.
month.title: Month

months.description: Translation of the word "months" in the locale.
months.title: Months

year.description: Translation of the word "year" in the locale.
year.title: Year

years.description: Translation of the word "years" in the locale.
years.title: Years

present.description: Translation of the word "present" in the locale.
present.title: Present

to.description: The word or character used to indicate a range in the locale (e.g., "2020 - 2021").
to.title: To

abbreviations_for_months.description: Abbreviations of the months in the locale.
abbreviations_for_months.title: Abbreviations For Months

full_names_of_months.description: Full names of the months in the locale.
full_names_of_months.title: Full Names Of Months

design.description: The design information of the CV. The default is the `classic` theme.
design.title: Design

locale.description: The locale catalog of the CV to allow the support of multiple languages.
locale.title: Locale Catalog

title: RenderCV
description: RenderCV allows you to version-control CVs/resumes as JSON or YAML files.
